mapper.insert: insert into Reviews (rno, pno, uno, r_content, r_img_path, r_img_name, r_img_o_name) values (seq_rno.nextval, #{pno}, #{uno}, #{r_content}, #{r_img_path, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r_img_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{r_img_o_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT r.rno, r.pno, r.uno, r.r_content, r.r_regdate, p.p_title, u.id AS sellerId, buyer.id AS buyerId FROM Reviews r JOIN Products p ON r.pno = p.pno LEFT JOIN Users u ON p.uno = u.uno LEFT JOIN Users buyer ON r.uno = buyer.uno where rno = #{rno}
mapper.update: update reviews set r_content= #{r_content}, r_updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT r.rno, r.pno, r.uno, r.r_content, r.r_img_path, r.r_img_name, r.r_img_o_name, r.r_regdate, r.r_updatedate, p.p_title AS productTitle, -- 상품명 u.id AS sellerId -- 판매자 ID FROM Reviews r LEFT JOIN Products p ON r.pno = p.pno LEFT JOIN Users u ON r.uno = u.uno -- 판매자 정보 가져오기 WHERE r.uno = #{uno} ORDER BY r.r_regdate DESC;
